1.content:
Its a beautiful day in the city of Townsville, until a giant monster attacks! The Powerpuff Girls rush into battle with the giant monster. The monster no harder or easier than any other they have faced before. As the battle rages on the monster shoots off a giant glob, knocking one of the girls to the ground and out of the fight. The remaining two, in a rage, kick it up a notch and manage to force the monster into a retreat.

The one who got hit by the glob was...
1.title: The battle

11.content:
After the battle Blossom and Buttercup quickly flew to Bubbles, trying to help her up without getting any of the glob on themselves. "Bubbles! Are you alright", Buttercup asked. Bubbles let out a little shake in her head.
"We should take you to the Professor then. Come on Bubbles", Blossom said with concern. And the three of them flew carefully back home to the Professor. He took her into his lab alone and proceed to do a check up on her. The Professor sighed and rubbed Bubbles' back gently. "I'm sorry, from what I can tell you are pregnant."

Bubbles took this news a little bit with a happy tone, "You mean... there is a baby in my tummy? I'm a mommy?! EEhehehehe!" She looked down and rubbed her own belly. All gitty and gleeful.

Of course it wasn't that simple, "Bubbles, I'm not sure if it is a monster's baby, or more of your own... I just know you are pregnant. Now go to bed and rest. I'll try to figure a know what it is or how to help you with this."
11.title: Bubbles

choices: Bubbles: she gets to be a giant with a shemale cock and nalls
Buttercup: has her own cock and balls
Blossom: grows huge with a huge cock and huge balls with lust

The powerpuff girls were looking for mojojo and they were at a toxic waste dump and one of them get infected by some spilled toxic waste as they feel strange and then.....
113.title: A different side-effect happens.

12.content:
After the battle Bubbles and Buttercup quickly flew to Blossom, trying to help her up without getting any of the glob on themselves. "Blossom! Are you alright", Buttercup asked. Blossom let out a little shake in her head.
"We should take you to the Professor then. Come on Blossom", Bubbles said with concern. And the three of them flew carefully back home to the Professor. He took her into his lab alone and proceed to do a check up on her. The Professor sighed and rubbed Blossom's back gently. "I'm sorry, from what I can tell you are pregnant."

Blossom took this news a little bit sad, "You mean... there is a baby in my tummy? I... I can't be Professor... I'm too young... I can't handle this... I- I- I......." She looked down and rubbed her own belly. Extremely concerned and worried.

Of course it wasn't that simple, "Blossom, I'm not sure if it is a monster's baby, or more of your own... I just know you are pregnant. Now go to bed and rest. I'll try to figure a know what it is or how to help you with this."
12.title: Blossom

122.content:
(chapter Originally by: JW24 )
After Blossom left, the Professor got to work on several tests that might determine what exactly was growing in his daughter's womb. He worked all night long until there were no other tests that could be run at the time. That morning he took Blossom aside to explain to her what the current situation was.

"Blossom I'm sorry to have to say this but I can't find out just what kind of baby is inside you until it starts growing."

"y-y-you m-m-mean that .." Blossom stuttered with tears in her eyes ,so upset by the news that she had a hard time keeping her thoughts straight.

"Yes we'll just have to wait dear," The Professor stated regretfully as he consoled his now sobbing daughter. Taking note of just how upset by the news Blossom was he let her stay home from class that day. Making sure that Bubbles and Buttercup were headed off to school he got to work preparing his lab for the checkups Blossom would need starting in a few months.
122.title: They are baby powerpuffs.

1223.content:
(Originally by: JW24 )

Unfortunately during those months Blossom hadn't taken her impending motherhood very well as between the morning sickness and fear of giving birth to monsters like the one that got her pregnant she had a hard time getting enough sleep. Everyday she looked in the mirror and was relieved when she didn't see any growth and horrified when her imagination ran wild with how she would look when she was due. Her sisters were concerned for her as they knew that it could have happened to them. Occasionally they wished that they were going through the same thing Blossom was so she didn't feel as unhappy.

Getting up on the examining table the Professor had set up Blossom hitched her dress up so that her the very slight curve of her belly was exposed.After four months the baby(ies) in Blossom's uterus was(were) large enough to be seen with the ultrasound the Professor had ordered.

"That's really cold ," Blossom said shivering from the feel of the gel the professor spread on her stomach.

"Sorry honey, you just need to put up with it for a few minutes so the machine here can see whats inside your belly ,okay." Explained the nervous parent as he was unsure of what would show up on the screen and afraid of having to deliver any more bad news concerning this pregnancy. Moving the wand over Blossom's belly several times to make sure of what he was seeing the Professor turned the screen so that the young mother-to-be could see ...
1223.title: A few months later.

12233.content:
"T-triplets? Th-three babies?!" Blossom exclaimed in exasperation. The professor nodded, "It appears so." The red-headed mother-to-be looked down at her swelling belly in wide wonder. She was amazed that not only would she soon be mothering one child, but three.

Bubbles and Buttercup hovered nearby, both exchanging eager glances. Bubbles squealed, "Oooh! Three new babies for me to play with! I'm gonna be the best auntie ever!" Giggled the blonde puff. Buttercup couldn't but but grin, "This is so cool! Finally I can have someone to play ball and stuff with! Maybe they'll even want to learn boxing with me!" She crossed her arms in satisfaction.

Blossom glanced over at the professor and noticed that tears were silently cascading down his cheeks. The pink puff rubbed her well-rounded stomach gently, "Professor? Are you...crying?" The professor sniffled and looked at his daughter, wiping the rivulets of snot off of his nose. He wrapped his arms around Blossom, careful not to squish her belly, saying softly, "I'm going to be a grandfather."

Blossom smiled. Maybe it wouldn't be so bad afterall.
12233.title: Triple baby powerpuffs.

info.brief_description: Interesting adventures and untold tales of the PowerPuff Girls.
info.description:
Its the city of Townsville! Where we meet the Power Puff Girls.

Not going into a giant opening with this story. You know who they are, or you don't and will go look them up. This is a fetish story for the most part, but open to normal adventures as well. When there is an option point for a fetish to start, please leave one option open for those who wish not to go fetish.

Anything goes for now, just no death of a main character please.
Will add rules if I see they need to be added.

PLEASE for the love of God, check your spelling and grammar. I will delete chapters if they are horrible with the both of those.
